analyzed: dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste /🔽de ni mnga' thang chen po brnyes pa'i snga ltas so //
translated: a broad chest like a lion,🔽a broad chest like a lion

original: yun ring por tshig snyan zhing 'jam pa dang / yid du 'ong ba gsungs pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa zhes bya ba ni bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyis khebs par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //🔽gsung gcig brjod pas rnam pa du mar go bar mdzad pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba ni /🔽'jig rten gyi khams mang po'i nang na bar chad pas /
analyzed: yun ring por tshig snyan zhing 'jam pa dang / yid du 'ong ba gsungs pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa zhes bya ba ni bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyis khebs par mdzad pa'i phyir ro // gsung gcig brjod pas rnam pa du mar go bar mdzad pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba ni / 'jig rten gyi khams mang po'i nang na bar chad pas /
translated: His tongue is very broad and slender, because for a long time he spoke pleasant, agreeable, and delightful words.🔽He has the Brahma voice, because he makes himself understood in many ways with a single utterance.

original: gnas pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi rna ba'i dbang po'i yul du mtshungs par gyur pa'i gsung dbyangs mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi rna ba'i dbang po'i yul du mtshungs par gyur pa'i gsung dbyangs mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: He has the voice of Brahma, because his voice is the same in all the world spheres.

original: de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so //
translated: These two are the signs of his having the five-limbed speech.

original: gsung dbyangs yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing /
analyzed: gsung dbyangs yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing /
translated: He has the five-limbed speech, because he has the five-limbed speech.

original: rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa nyid dang / @172b zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'gro ba dang / gtang mi bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa nyid dang / @172b zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'gro ba dang / gtang mi bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o //
translated: It is not confused, and is clear.

original: ma 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba ni legs par go bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ma 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba ni legs par go bar byed pa'o //
translated: It is not confused means that it is well understood.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsal ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsal ba zhes bya ste /
translated: For that very reason, it is clear.

original: gdul bya'i skye bo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyud la go bar mdzad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gdul bya'i skye bo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyud la go bar mdzad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is clear because it is understood in the mindstreams of various disciples.

original: yun ring po nas tshig 'khyal pa spong zhing dus su smra bar gsungs pas na 'gram pa seng ge 'dra ste /
analyzed: yun ring po nas tshig 'khyal pa spong zhing dus su smra bar gsungs pas na 'gram pa seng ge 'dra ste /
translated: Since he has long abandoned idle chitchat and speaks at the proper time, his cheeks are like a lion’s.

original: de ni tshig kun gyis gzung bar 'os pa'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: de ni tshig kun gyis gzung bar 'os pa'i snga ltas so //
translated: This is a sign that his speech is to be accepted by all.

original: rim gro byas pa dang / brnyas pa med pa nyid kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas /
analyzed: rim gro byas pa dang / brnyas pa med pa nyid kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas /
translated: Since his livelihood is pure, he has no pride and no contempt for others.

original: tshems shin tu dkar pa nyid dang / tshems mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: tshems shin tu dkar pa nyid dang / tshems mnyam pa ste /
translated: He has very white teeth and even teeth.

original: de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so //
translated: This is a premonition of the assembly that will be gathered from the beginning.

original: yun ring po nas bden pa'i tsheg dang / phra ma med pa'i tshig tu spyod pas tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: yun ring po nas bden pa'i tsheg dang / phra ma med pa'i tshig tu spyod pas tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste /
translated: Because he has practiced for a long time with words of truth and without slander, he has good teeth and forty teeth.

original: de ni 'khor mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: de ni 'khor mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so //
translated: This is a premonition of an undivided assembly.

original: bang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa med la ma chags mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste /
analyzed: bang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa med la ma chags mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste /
translated: Because he has looked with eyes free from attachment, aversion, and delusion, as if embracing with his arms, he has eyes like an ox king and eyelashes like an ox king.

original: de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so zhes bya ba spyan phye ba'i tshul dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so zhes bya ba spyan phye ba'i tshul dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is a premonition of complete beauty.

original: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan nas /
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the thirty-two marks of a great being,

original: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa ni /
translated: in order to explain the eighty minor marks, it is said:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang / gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste sen mo mdog snum pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang / gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste sen mo mdog snum pa dang /
translated: They have a mind that is loving to all sentient beings, like a loving relative, and so their nails are shiny.

original: rigs rgyud mthon po 'byung ba ste sen mo mtho ba yin //
analyzed: rigs rgyud mthon po 'byung ba ste sen mo mtho ba yin //
translated: They come from a high family lineage, and so their nails are high.

original: spyod tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste sor mo zlum pa yin /
analyzed: spyod tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste sor mo zlum pa yin /
translated: They have no faults in their conduct, and so their fingers are round.🔽Their fingers are full because they have accumulated the roots of virtue, and their fingers are tapered because they have gradually entered the roots of virtue.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa nyid kyis sor mo rgyas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis zhugs pa nyid kyis sor mo rnams byin gyis phra ba dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rab tu bsrungs pas rtsa mi mngon pa dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa nyid kyis sor mo rgyas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis zhugs pa nyid kyis sor mo rnams byin gyis phra ba dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rab tu bsrungs pas rtsa mi mngon pa dang /
translated: They have protected their physical, verbal, and mental activity and livelihood, and so their veins are not visible.

original: nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grol bar mdzad pa nyid kyis rtsa ma dud pa med pa dang / chos shin tu @173a * //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grol bar mdzad pa nyid kyis rtsa ma dud pa med pa dang / chos shin tu @173a * //
translated: His ankles do not protrude because he unties the knot of the afflictions.🔽He has no uneven feet because he has the intelligence of a very pure mind and because he liberates beings from all difficult situations.

original: gtsang ba'i blo gros can nyid kyis long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang / bgrod dka' ba'i gnas thams cad las sgrol bar mdzad pa nyid kyis zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa dang / mi'i seng ge nyid kyis ni seng ge'i stabs su bzhud pa nyid dang /
analyzed: gtsang ba'i blo gros can nyid kyis long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang / bgrod dka' ba'i gnas thams cad las sgrol bar mdzad pa nyid kyis zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa dang / mi'i seng ge nyid kyis ni seng ge'i stabs su bzhud pa nyid dang /
translated: He walks with the gait of a lion because he is the lion among men.🔽He walks with the gait of an elephant because he is the elephant among men.🔽He walks with the gait of a swan because he moves through the sky like the king of swans.

original: mi'i glang po nyid kyis glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la gshegs pa nyid kyis ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stabs su gshegs par mkhas pa nyid dang / mi'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa nyid kyis khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mi'i glang po nyid kyis glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la gshegs pa nyid kyis ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stabs su gshegs par mkhas pa nyid dang / mi'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa nyid kyis khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang /
translated: He walks with the gait of a bull because he is the bull among men.

original: skor phyogs kyi lam dang mthun par gshegs pa nyid kyis g-yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa nyid dang / blta na mdzes pa ste mdzes par gshegs pa nyid dang / rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste drang por gshegs pa nyid dang /
analyzed: skor phyogs kyi lam dang mthun par gshegs pa nyid kyis g-yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa nyid dang / blta na mdzes pa ste mdzes par gshegs pa nyid dang / rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste drang por gshegs pa nyid dang /
translated: He walks in a way that is in harmony with the right-hand path, he walks in a way that is beautiful to behold, he walks in a way that is always upright, never crooked.

original: yon tan yang dag par brjod pa nyid kyis sku 'khril bag chags pa nyid dang / sdig pa'i chos dang ma sbags pa nyid kyis sku byi dor byas pa lta bu nyid dang / gdul bya dang 'tsham par chos ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis sku rim par 'tsham pa nyid dang /
analyzed: yon tan yang dag par brjod pa nyid kyis sku 'khril bag chags pa nyid dang / sdig pa'i chos dang ma sbags pa nyid kyis sku byi dor byas pa lta bu nyid dang / gdul bya dang 'tsham par chos ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis sku rim par 'tsham pa nyid dang /
translated: His body is well rounded because he has perfectly expressed good qualities, his body is smooth like it has been polished because it is unstained by negative qualities, his body is well proportioned because he teaches the Dharma in accordance with his disciples.

original: sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba'i phyir sku gtsang ba nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sku 'jam pa nyid dang / thugs rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir sku rnam par dag pa nyid dang /
analyzed: sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba'i phyir sku gtsang ba nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sku 'jam pa nyid dang / thugs rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir sku rnam par dag pa nyid dang /
translated: Because his body, speech and mind are pure, he has a pure body, because he naturally has a gentle mind, he has a gentle body, because his mind is naturally pure, he has a pure body,

original: chos 'dul ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir mtshan rdzogs pa nyid dang / yangs shing mdzes pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir sku yangs shing bzang ba nyid dang / thams cad la thugs snyoms pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chos 'dul ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir mtshan rdzogs pa nyid dang / yangs shing mdzes pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir sku yangs shing bzang ba nyid dang / thams cad la thugs snyoms pa'i phyir /
translated: because he has completed the Dharma Vinaya, he has complete marks, because he has the qualities of being vast and beautiful, he has a vast and beautiful body, because his mind is impartial to all,

original: gom pa snyoms pa nyid dang / rnam par dag pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gom pa snyoms pa nyid dang / rnam par dag pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir /
translated: he has an even gait, because he teaches the pure Dharma,

original: spyan rnam par dag pa nyid dang / chos shin tu go sla ba ston pa'i phyir /
analyzed: spyan rnam par dag pa nyid dang / chos shin tu go sla ba ston pa'i phyir /
translated: he has pure eyes, because he teaches the Dharma in a very understandable way,

original: sku shin tu gzhon sha can nyid dang ; thugs rtag tu ma zhum pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sku shin tu gzhon sha can nyid dang ; thugs rtag tu ma zhum pa'i phyir /
translated: he has a very youthful body, and because his mind is never discouraged,🔽he has a lion-like body.

original: sku zhum pa med pa nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'phags pa'i phyir /🔽sku rgyas pa nyid dang / yang srid ba zad pa nyid kyis sku shin tu grims pa nyid dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shin tu rnam par phye ba rab @173b tu ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: sku zhum pa med pa nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'phags pa'i phyir / sku rgyas pa nyid dang / yang srid ba zad pa nyid kyis sku shin tu grims pa nyid dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shin tu rnam par phye ba rab @173b tu ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis /
translated: His body is not emaciated because his roots of virtue are exalted.🔽His body is well rounded because he has exhausted rebirth.🔽His limbs and joints are well rounded because he teaches the well-differentiated dependent origination.🔽His vision is clear and pure because he teaches the pure meaning of the words.

original: yan lag dang nying lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa nyid dang / tshig don rnam par dag pa ston pas gzigs pa rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa nyid dang / slob ma phun sum tshogs par gyur pa nyid kyis dku zlum pa nyid dang /
analyzed: yan lag dang nying lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa nyid dang / tshig don rnam par dag pa ston pas gzigs pa rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa nyid dang / slob ma phun sum tshogs par gyur pa nyid kyis dku zlum pa nyid dang /
translated: His belly is round because he has excellent disciples.

original: 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma sbags pa nyid kyis dku skabs phyin pa nyid dang / nga rgyal gyis 'gying ba bcom pa nyid kyis dku ma rnyongs pa nyid dang / chos zad pa rnam par ldog pa nyid kyis phyal phyang ba nyid dang / chos zab mo rtogs pa nyid kyis lte ba zab pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma sbags pa nyid kyis dku skabs phyin pa nyid dang / nga rgyal gyis 'gying ba bcom pa nyid kyis dku ma rnyongs pa nyid dang / chos zad pa rnam par ldog pa nyid kyis phyal phyang ba nyid dang / chos zab mo rtogs pa nyid kyis lte ba zab pa nyid dang /
translated: Since it is not sullied by the faults of samsara, it is well rounded. Since it has conquered the haughtiness of pride, it is not sunken in. Since the exhaustion of phenomena is reversed, it is full. Since it realizes the profound Dharma, it is deep.

original: slob ma mthun par mdzad pa nyid kyis lte ba g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba nyid dang / slob ma'i tshogs kun nas mdzes par gyur pa nyid kyis kun nas mdzes pa nyid dang / thugs shin tu gtsang ba nyid kyis kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba nyid dang /
analyzed: slob ma mthun par mdzad pa nyid kyis lte ba g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba nyid dang / slob ma'i tshogs kun nas mdzes par gyur pa nyid kyis kun nas mdzes pa nyid dang / thugs shin tu gtsang ba nyid kyis kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba nyid dang /
translated: Since it is the friend of disciples, it is coiled to the right. Since the assembly of disciples is completely beautiful, it is completely beautiful. Since the mind is very pure, it is completely pure.

original: dus ma yin pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid dang bral ba nyid kyis sku la sme ba gnag bag med pa nyid dang / lus la sogs pa zo mdog bde ba nyid kyis phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa nyid dang / rang gi skye bo dang skye bo phal pa la byams pa nyid kyis dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa nyid kyi phyir phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa nyid dang /
analyzed: dus ma yin pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid dang bral ba nyid kyis sku la sme ba gnag bag med pa nyid dang / lus la sogs pa zo mdog bde ba nyid kyis phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa nyid dang / rang gi skye bo dang skye bo phal pa la byams pa nyid kyis dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa nyid kyi phyir phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa nyid dang /
translated: His hands are soft like cotton wool because he has a happy complexion and so on and he has attained the state of a great ascetic because he has love for his own people and for ordinary people.🔽His hand lines are radiant because he abides in the most profound Dharma and his hand lines are long because he teaches the Dharma perfectly in the future.

original: mchog tu zab pa'i chos la gnas pa nyid kyis phyag gi ri mo zab pa nyid dang / phyi rjes su yang dag par yongs su dag pa'i chos ston par mdzad pan yid kyis phyag gi ri mo ring ba nyid dang / bslab pa ha cang mi ring bar 'cha' ba nyid kyis zhal zha cang mi ring ba nyid dang /
analyzed: mchog tu zab pa'i chos la gnas pa nyid kyis phyag gi ri mo zab pa nyid dang / phyi rjes su yang dag par yongs su dag pa'i chos ston par mdzad pan yid kyis phyag gi ri mo ring ba nyid dang / bslab pa ha cang mi ring bar 'cha' ba nyid kyis zhal zha cang mi ring ba nyid dang /
translated: His face is not too long because he sets forth the training without excess.

original: 'jig rten thams cad gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar gzigs pa nyid kyis mchu bim pa ltar dmar ba nyid dang / tshig 'jam po sngon du 'gro bas 'dul ba nyid kyis ljags mnyen pa nyid dang / yon tan 'thad pa mang po mnga' ba nyid kyis ljags srab ba nyid dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar gzigs pa nyid kyis mchu bim pa ltar dmar ba nyid dang / tshig 'jam po sngon du 'gro bas 'dul ba nyid kyis ljags mnyen pa nyid dang / yon tan 'thad pa mang po mnga' ba nyid kyis ljags srab ba nyid dang /
translated: His tongue is slender because he has many appropriate good qualities.🔽His tongue is red because his Dharma discipline is difficult to fathom like a child's attachment.

original: chos 'dul ba la byis pa ltar chags pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid kyis ljags dmar ba nyid dang / glang po'i sgra dang / 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba nyid kyis glang po che'i nga ro dang / dbyangs dang ldan pa nyid dang /
analyzed: chos 'dul ba la byis pa ltar chags pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid kyis ljags dmar ba nyid dang / glang po'i sgra dang / 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba nyid kyis glang po che'i nga ro dang / dbyangs dang ldan pa nyid dang /
translated: He has an elephant's voice and a melodious voice because he is fearless like the voice of an elephant or a dragon.

original: snyan cing 'jam la yid du 'ong bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba @174a * //
analyzed: snyan cing 'jam la yid du 'ong bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba @174a * //
translated: He has students who speak pleasantly, gently and attractively.

original: nyid kyis gsung snyan cing mnyen la 'jam pa nyid dang / srid pa kun du bsdams pa bcad pa nyid kyis mche ba zlum pa nyid dang / skye bo gdul bar dka' ba rnams 'dul ba la mkhas pa nyid kyis mche ba rno ba nyid dang /🔽chos 'dul ba shin tu dkar bas na mche ba dkar ba nyid dang / mnyam pa'i sa la bzhag pa nyid kyis mche ba mnyam pa nyid dang / mthar gyis mngon par rtogs pa yang dag par ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis mche ba byin gyis phra ba nyid dang /
analyzed: nyid kyis gsung snyan cing mnyen la 'jam pa nyid dang / srid pa kun du bsdams pa bcad pa nyid kyis mche ba zlum pa nyid dang / skye bo gdul bar dka' ba rnams 'dul ba la mkhas pa nyid kyis mche ba rno ba nyid dang / chos 'dul ba shin tu dkar bas na mche ba dkar ba nyid dang / mnyam pa'i sa la bzhag pa nyid kyis mche ba mnyam pa nyid dang / mthar gyis mngon par rtogs pa yang dag par ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis mche ba byin gyis phra ba nyid dang /
translated: His teeth are round because he has cut the fetters of existence.🔽His teeth are white because the Dharma and Vinaya are very white. His teeth are even because he has placed them on the level of evenness. His teeth are fine because he teaches the successive realizations.

original: shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa nyid kyis shangs mtho ba nyid dang / 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma phun sum tshogs pa nyid kyis shangs gtsang ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos shin tu rgya che ba mnga' ba nyid kyi spyan yangs pa nyid dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa nyid kyis shangs mtho ba nyid dang / 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma phun sum tshogs pa nyid kyis shangs gtsang ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos shin tu rgya che ba mnga' ba nyid kyi spyan yangs pa nyid dang /
translated: His nose is prominent because he dwells on the high mountain of wisdom. His nose is clean because he has a perfect retinue of disciples. His eyes are large because he has the very extensive qualities of a buddha.

original: sems can gyi tshogs drangs pa nyid kyis rdzi ma stug pa nyid dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang padma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa lta bu ltar 'dug pa'i spyan gyis lha dang / lha ma yin dang / skyes pa dang / na chung mchog mngon par dga' bar mdzad pa nyid kyis spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /
analyzed: sems can gyi tshogs drangs pa nyid kyis rdzi ma stug pa nyid dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang padma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa lta bu ltar 'dug pa'i spyan gyis lha dang / lha ma yin dang / skyes pa dang / na chung mchog mngon par dga' bar mdzad pa nyid kyis spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /
translated: His eyelashes are very thick because he attracts a multitude of sentient beings. His eyes are like the open petals of a lotus, with the whites and blacks clearly distinct, and he delights the gods, demigods, men and women with his eyes.

original: padma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu nyid dang rtag tu phyi rjes su gzigs pa nyid kyis smin mtshams ring ba nyid dang / chos 'dul ba dkar po la mkhas pa nyid kyis 'jam pa nyid dang / kun gzigs pa nyid kyis smin ma'i spu mnyam pa nyid dang /
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu nyid dang rtag tu phyi rjes su gzigs pa nyid kyis smin mtshams ring ba nyid dang / chos 'dul ba dkar po la mkhas pa nyid kyis 'jam pa nyid dang / kun gzigs pa nyid kyis smin ma'i spu mnyam pa nyid dang /
translated: His eyebrows are long because he always looks after others, his face is smooth because he is skilled in the white, virtuous Dharma, the hairs on his eyebrows are even because he sees all things,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis bskus par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba nyid kyis smin ma snum par gyur ba nyid dang / mchog tu gnod pa bzlog par mdzad pa nyid kyis phyag ring zhing rgyas pa nyid dang / nyon mongs pa'i g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba nyid kyis snyan mnyam pa nyid dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis bskus par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba nyid kyis smin ma snum par gyur ba nyid dang / mchog tu gnod pa bzlog par mdzad pa nyid kyis phyag ring zhing rgyas pa nyid dang / nyon mongs pa'i g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba nyid kyis snyan mnyam pa nyid dang /
translated: His eyebrows are glossy because he disciplines beings who are anointed with the oil of the roots of virtue. His arms are long and expansive because he is the one who wards off the greatest harm. His ears are equal in size because he is victorious in the battle against the afflictions.

original: sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa nyid kyis snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa nyid dang / lta bas byas pa thams cad kyi gzhan du mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis dpral ba legs par 'byes pa nyid dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i dge sbyong dang /
analyzed: sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa nyid kyis snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa nyid dang / lta bas byas pa thams cad kyi gzhan du mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis dpral ba legs par 'byes pa nyid dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i dge sbyong dang /
translated: His ears are unimpaired because he disciplines all beings whose intentions are unimpaired. His forehead is broad because he is not swayed by any views. His eyes are long because he sees the world six times each day and night.

original: bram ze rab tu 'joms pa nyid kyis dpral ba'i dbyes che ba nyid dang / smon lam gyi mchog yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyis dbu shin tu rgyas pa nyid @174b dang ; yul gyi bung ba'i dga' ba bzlog par mdzad pa nyid kyis dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang /
analyzed: bram ze rab tu 'joms pa nyid kyis dpral ba'i dbyes che ba nyid dang / smon lam gyi mchog yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyis dbu shin tu rgyas pa nyid @174b dang ; yul gyi bung ba'i dga' ba bzlog par mdzad pa nyid kyis dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang /
translated: His forehead is broad because he is a great brahman. His head is very large because he has perfected the supreme aspiration. His hair is black like a bee because he has turned away from the honey of objects.

original: mthong ba dang bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba'i bag la nyal spangs pa nyid kyis dbu skra stug pa nyid dang / bstan pa thugs 'jam pas thugs su chud pa nyid kyis dbu skra 'jam pa nyid dang ; 'dod chags la sogs pas ma ma 'khrugs pa nyid kyis dbu skra ma 'dzings pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mthong ba dang bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba'i bag la nyal spangs pa nyid kyis dbu skra stug pa nyid dang / bstan pa thugs 'jam pas thugs su chud pa nyid kyis dbu skra 'jam pa nyid dang ; 'dod chags la sogs pas ma ma 'khrugs pa nyid kyis dbu skra ma 'dzings pa nyid dang /
translated: His hair is thick because he has abandoned the latent tendencies of the discards of seeing and meditation. His hair is soft because he has understood with a gentle mind. His hair is not frizzy because he is not disturbed by attachment and so forth.

original: rtag tu tshig mi rtsub pa nyid kyis dbu skra mi bshor ba nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog g-yas su phyogs nas bkram pa nyid kyis dbu skra dri zhim pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mdzes par gyur pa nyid kyis phyag dang zhabs la dpal be'u dang /
analyzed: rtag tu tshig mi rtsub pa nyid kyis dbu skra mi bshor ba nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog g-yas su phyogs nas bkram pa nyid kyis dbu skra dri zhim pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mdzes par gyur pa nyid kyis phyag dang zhabs la dpal be'u dang /
translated: His hair is not disheveled because he is always gentle in speech. His hair is fragrant because the flowers of the branches of enlightenment are scattered to the right.🔽

original: bkra shis dang / g-yung drung dang / g-yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: bkra shis dang / g-yung drung dang / g-yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan pa nyid yin no //
translated: His hair is not disheveled because he is always gentle in speech. His hair is fragrant because the flowers of the branches of enlightenment are scattered to the right. His hands and feet are adorned with auspicious signs, swastikas, and spirals because he is beautiful in every way.

original: mdo lhug pa 'di bsdu bar bya ba'i don du tshig le'ur byas pa sbyar ba ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: mdo lhug pa 'di bsdu bar bya ba'i don du tshig le'ur byas pa sbyar ba ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is the verse summary for the purpose of condensing this loose sutra:🔽The Sage has copper-colored nails,

original: thub pa'i sen mo zangs mdog dang // mdog snum mtho dang sor mo rnams //
analyzed: thub pa'i sen mo zangs mdog dang // mdog snum mtho dang sor mo rnams //
translated: shiny color, tall fingers,🔽round, full, slender,

original: zlum rgyas byin gyis phra ba dang // rtsa mi mngon dang mdud pa med //
analyzed: zlum rgyas byin gyis phra ba dang // rtsa mi mngon dang mdud pa med //
translated: veins not visible, no knots,🔽ankles not visible, even feet,🔽lion, elephant,

original: long bu mi mngon zhabs mnyam dang // seng ge glang chen bya dang ni //
analyzed: long bu mi mngon zhabs mnyam dang // seng ge glang chen bya dang ni //
translated: bird,

original: khyu mchog stabs gshegs g-yas phyogs dang // mdzes gshegs drang dang 'khril bag chags //
analyzed: khyu mchog stabs gshegs g-yas phyogs dang // mdzes gshegs drang dang 'khril bag chags //
translated: beautiful gait, straight, with a rolling gait,

original: byi dor byas 'dra rim par 'tsham //
analyzed: byi dor byas 'dra rim par 'tsham //
translated: like it has been polished, in proportion,

original: gtsang dang 'jam dang dag pa'i sku //
analyzed: gtsang dang 'jam dang dag pa'i sku //
translated: a body that is pure, soft, and clean,🔽with complete major marks,

original: mtshan ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang // sku yi kho lag yangs shing bzang //
analyzed: mtshan ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang // sku yi kho lag yangs shing bzang //
translated: a body with broad joints,🔽even steps, pure eyes,🔽very youthful eyes,🔽a body that is not stooped, full,🔽and very firm,🔽with very distinct limbs,🔽with pure, unclouded vision,

original: gom snyoms spyan ni dag pa dang // shin tu gzhon mdog spyan nyid dang // sku zhum med dang rgyas pa dang // shin tu grims pa'i sku nyid dang // yan lag shin tu rnam 'byes dang // gzigs pa mun med dag pa dang // dku zlum skabs phyin ma rnyongs dang //
analyzed: gom snyoms spyan ni dag pa dang // shin tu gzhon mdog spyan nyid dang // sku zhum med dang rgyas pa dang // shin tu grims pa'i sku nyid dang // yan lag shin tu rnam 'byes dang // gzigs pa mun med dag pa dang // dku zlum skabs phyin ma rnyongs dang //
translated: with a round belly, with a well-proportioned belly,🔽without a protruding belly,

original: phyang nge ba dang lte ba ni //
analyzed: phyang nge ba dang lte ba ni //
translated: with a navel🔽that is deep, turns to the right,🔽and is attractive from all sides,

original: zab dang g-yas phyogs 'khyil ba dang // kun nas blta na sdug pa dang / kun spyod gtsang dang sku la ni //
analyzed: zab dang g-yas phyogs 'khyil ba dang // kun nas blta na sdug pa dang / kun spyod gtsang dang sku la ni //

original: don dam pa ma yin byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par thal bar 'gyur ba dang / de rnams gnyi ga yongs su shes par yang dag pa nas brtsams te /
analyzed: don dam pa ma yin byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par thal bar 'gyur ba dang / de rnams gnyi ga yongs su shes par yang dag pa nas brtsams te /
translated: If the ultimate were the presentation of the results of the path, it would follow that all ordinary beings would have attained the result of stream enterer, and it would also follow that all noble beings would have attained the result of arhat.

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su gcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa med na /
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su gcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa med na /
translated: If the ultimate were the presentation of the results of the path, then the three realms would be divided into compounded and uncompounded realms, and the results of the path would be presented as being the abandonment of the three fetters and so on.

original: chos kyi dbyings la kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas 'bras bu dang po dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems srabs  pas /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas 'bras bu dang po dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems srabs  pas /
translated: If the ultimate were the presentation of the results of the path, then the first result would be the abandonment of the three fetters, the abandonment of desire and malice, and the reduction of ignorance.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / tha ma'i cha dang ldan pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / gong ma'i cha dang ldan pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu nyid nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du rgya cher gsungs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis par zhus pa dang /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / tha ma'i cha dang ldan pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / gong ma'i cha dang ldan pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu nyid nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du rgya cher gsungs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis par zhus pa dang /
translated: the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner through abandoning the five fetters associated with the lower part, the result of arhatship through abandoning the five fetters associated with the higher part, and from that up to perfect complete enlightenment.

original: dus gang gi tshe skad cig ma gcig gis chos thams cad rtogs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i dpes //
analyzed: dus gang gi tshe skad cig ma gcig gis chos thams cad rtogs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i dpes //
translated: At whatever time all phenomena are realized in a single moment, through the example of the emanations of the Tathagata,

original: chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji snyed pa khong du chud do zhes lan gsungs pa dang / chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rdzogs par zhus pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i dpes de bstan pa sprul lam bsgom pa la brten kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /🔽rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar dngos po med pa'i @177a * //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji snyed pa khong du chud do zhes lan gsungs pa dang / chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rdzogs par zhus pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i dpes de bstan pa sprul lam bsgom pa la brten kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar dngos po med pa'i @177a * //
translated: When asked, What are the characteristics of phenomena? he taught using the example of a tathagata's emanations. He taught that although emanations are based on meditation, they do not become afflicted or pure.

original: chos rab tu rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu yin na yang /
analyzed: chos rab tu rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu yin na yang /
translated: He taught that phenomena are fully understood to be unreal and that although all phenomena are like emanations,🔽bodhisattvas see illusory phenomena and that this is the activity of a person.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sgyu ma lta bu'i chos mthong ba'i skyes bu byed pa nyi dang / de lta yin na sems can rnams kyi don byed pa la 'jug pa don med par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyis de ltar ma shes pas de 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin par bstan to zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sgyu ma lta bu'i chos mthong ba'i skyes bu byed pa nyi dang / de lta yin na sems can rnams kyi don byed pa la 'jug pa don med par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyis de ltar ma shes pas de 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin par bstan to zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: He taught that if that were all there were, it would be pointless to engage in benefiting sentient beings and that since sentient beings do not understand that, it is meaningful.

original: de bzhin du 'og ma 'og ma rnams la brgal ba dang / lan rjes su sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'og ma 'og ma rnams la brgal ba dang / lan rjes su sbyar te /
translated: Likewise, the refutations and responses should be applied in order to the other perfections,

original: gcig nas gcig tu brjod pa'i gnas mdo las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du rgya cher brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gcig nas gcig tu brjod pa'i gnas mdo las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du rgya cher brjod par bya ste /
translated: and the topics should be explained extensively in accordance with the sutra statements.

original: kho bos ni gzhung mangs kyi dogs pa'i phyir bsdu ba tsam byas pa yin no //
analyzed: kho bos ni gzhung mangs kyi dogs pa'i phyir bsdu ba tsam byas pa yin no //
translated: But I have only summarized them, fearing excessive length.🔽The meaning of the words is as follows: The first generation of the mind of enlightenment is like the magician, the middle is like the illusion, and the final is like the audience.🔽The first, middle, and final generations of the mind of enlightenment are respectively like the magician, the illusion, and the audience.🔽The magician is like the first generation of the mind of enlightenment, because he creates the illusion.🔽The illusion is like the middle generation of the mind of enlightenment, because it is created by the magician.

original: sems can rnams kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du bkod pa ni gang sgyu ma mkhan gyi dpes sems dang po bskyed pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can thog ma dang bar dang / tha ma rnams su chos kyi dbyings 'khrug pa med pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa dang /🔽gzhan rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad do zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du bkod pa ni gang sgyu ma mkhan gyi dpes sems dang po bskyed pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can thog ma dang bar dang / tha ma rnams su chos kyi dbyings 'khrug pa med pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi don ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa dang /🔽gzhan rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad do zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The audience is like the final generation of the mind of enlightenment, because they see the illusion.🔽The magician is like the bodhisattva, because he creates the illusion.🔽The illusion is like the bodhisattva, because he creates the illusion.🔽The audience is like the sentient beings, because they see the illusion.🔽The magician is like the bodhisattva, because he creates the illusion.🔽The illusion is like the bodhisattva, because he creates the illusion.🔽The audience is like the sentient beings, because they see the illusion.🔽The magician is like the bodhisattva, because he creates the illusion.🔽The illusion is like the bodhisattva, because he creates the illusion.🔽The audience is like the sentient beings, because they see the illusion.🔽The magician is like the bodhisattva, because he creates the illusion.🔽The illusion is like the bodhisattva, because he creates the illusion.🔽The audience is like the sentient beings, because they see the illusion.🔽The magician is like the bodhisattva, because he creates the illusion.🔽The illusion is like the bodhisattva, because he creates the illusion.🔽The audience is like the sentient beings, because they see the illusion.🔽The magician is like the bodhisattva, because he creates the illusion.🔽The illusion is like the bodhisattva, because he creates the illusion.🔽The audience is like the sentient beings, because they see the illusion.🔽The magician is like the bodhisattva, because he creates the illusion.🔽The illusion is like the bodhisattva, because he creates the illusion.🔽The audience is like the sentient beings, because they see the illusion.🔽The magician is like the bodhisattva, because he creates the illusion.🔽The illusion is like the bodhisattva,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'god pa ni gang de'i rjes la pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rab tu zhugs pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'god pa ni gang de'i rjes la pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rab tu zhugs pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The establishment in the six perfections is the activity of engaging in the six perfections that follows that.

original: sangs rgyas kyi lam la dgod pa dang / gang de'i 'og tu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam nas brtsams te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi lam la dgod pa dang / gang de'i 'og tu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam nas brtsams te /
translated: The establishment in the Buddha path is the activity of establishing in the ten wholesome actions and so on,

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no ;
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no ;
translated: up to perfect complete enlightenment that follows that.

original: / rang bzhin gyis stong pan yid la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu de'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes rgya cher bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: / rang bzhin gyis stong pan yid la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu de'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes rgya cher bstan pa yin no //
translated: The establishment in the emptiness of inherent nature is the activity of establishing in the emptiness of inherent nature that follows that.

original: gnyis su med pa'i chos la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i dgra bcom pa dang / rmi lam gyi nang gi dpe gnyis kyis gnyis su med pa la mngon par rtogs pa la 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i chos la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i dgra bcom pa dang / rmi lam gyi nang gi dpe gnyis kyis gnyis su med pa la mngon par rtogs pa la 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The function of establishing in the Dharma of nonduality is shown by the next two examples, the Tathagata's emanation of an arhat and the dream.

original: brdar btags pa shes pa la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu gnas brtan rab 'byor bdag nyid dbang du gyur pa'i @177b dpes chos thams cad tha snyad du btags pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: brdar btags pa shes pa la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu gnas brtan rab 'byor bdag nyid dbang du gyur pa'i @177b dpes chos thams cad tha snyad du btags pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The function of establishing in the knowledge of conventional designation is shown by the next example, the elder Subhuti's mastery of himself.

original: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The function of establishing in the maturation of beings is shown by the next example, the six perfections.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i lam la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i lam la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The establishment in the Bodhisattva path is the performance of the action of establishing in the Bodhisattva path, the perfections, etc., which is subsequent to that.

original: chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa spang ba la 'god pa ni gang de'i rjes la chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //🔽yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu byang chub la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa spang ba la 'god pa ni gang de'i rjes la chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no // yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu byang chub la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The establishment in the abandonment of attachment to all things is the performance of the action of establishing in the absence of attachment to all things, which is subsequent to that.🔽The establishment in perfect enlightenment is the performance of the action of establishing in enlightenment, which is subsequent to that.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa dag pa la 'god pa ni de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa dag pa la 'god pa ni de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The establishment in the purification of the Buddha-field is the performance of the action of establishing in the purification of the Buddha-field, which is subsequent to that.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par 'jog pa ni gang de'i 'og tu sems dang po bskyed pa dang phyir mi ldog pa dang srid pa tha mar so sor nges pa la 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par 'jog pa ni gang de'i 'og tu sems dang po bskyed pa dang phyir mi ldog pa dang srid pa tha mar so sor nges pa la 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The function of establishing in perfect complete enlightenment is that which is taught as the function of establishing in the first generation of the Thought, in the irreversibility, and in the final life.

original: sems can gyi don tshad med pa la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can gyi don tshad med pa la 'god pa ni gang de'i 'og tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The function of establishing in the immeasurable benefit of sentient beings is that which is taught as the function of accomplishing the benefit of sentient beings in the immeasurable world systems of the ten directions.

original: sangs rgyas kyi drung du nye bar 'gro ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba la sogs pa la dgod pa ni gang de'i rjes thogs la 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs su sangs rgyas kyi drung du nye bar 'gro ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi drung du nye bar 'gro ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba la sogs pa la dgod pa ni gang de'i rjes thogs la 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs su sangs rgyas kyi drung du nye bar 'gro ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: The function of establishing in going to the presence of the Buddhas and in serving them, etc. is that which is taught as the function of going to the presence of the Buddhas in the various world systems, and of serving them, and so on, immediately after that.

original: mngon par shes pa bsgrubs pa'i sgo nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par spong ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la nges par sbyor bar 'god pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag la dgod pa ni gang de'i 'og @178a * //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa bsgrubs pa'i sgo nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par spong ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la nges par sbyor bar 'god pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no // byang chub kyi yan lag la dgod pa ni gang de'i 'og @178a * //
translated: The activity of establishing in the superknowledges is the performance of the activity of establishing in the six perfections, by means of which one abandons the resistances to the six perfections and definitely engages in the perfections.

original: tu byang chub kyi yan lag tu gyur pa sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams la rab tu 'jog pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: tu byang chub kyi yan lag tu gyur pa sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams la rab tu 'jog pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The activity of establishing in the branches of enlightenment is the performance of the activity of establishing in the virtues of generosity, etc., which are the branches of enlightenment.

original: las dang 'bras bu 'brel ba chud mi za ba la dgod pa ni gang de'i rjes la las dang 'bras bu 'brel ba'i tha snyad 'gro ba lde'i 'khor ba rnam par 'jig pa la rab tu 'jig pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: las dang 'bras bu 'brel ba chud mi za ba la dgod pa ni gang de'i rjes la las dang 'bras bu 'brel ba'i tha snyad 'gro ba lde'i 'khor ba rnam par 'jig pa la rab tu 'jig pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The activity of establishing in the relation between action and result is the performance of the activity of establishing in the relation between action and result, by means of which one does not destroy the continuity of the world, which is the continuity of the relation between action and result.

original: bden pa mthong ba la dgod pa ni gang de'i rjes la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: bden pa mthong ba la dgod pa ni gang de'i rjes la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The setting forth in the seeing of the truth is the deed of establishing in the realization of the equality of the four noble truths that follows that.

original: phyin ci log spang ba la dgod pa ni gang de'i rjes la phyin ci log bzhi spang ba la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //🔽phyin ci log bzhi med pa spang ba'i ye shes la dgod pa ni gang de'i rjes la sku'i cha shas tsam gyis dngos po bkag pa dang rmi lam dang gzugs brnyan dang sgra brnyan dang smig rgyu dang sgyu ma dang sprul pa'i dpes phyin ci log bzhi med
analyzed: phyin ci log spang ba la dgod pa ni gang de'i rjes la phyin ci log bzhi spang ba la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no // phyin ci log bzhi med pa spang ba'i ye shes la dgod pa ni gang de'i rjes la sku'i cha shas tsam gyis dngos po bkag pa dang rmi lam dang gzugs brnyan dang sgra brnyan dang smig rgyu dang sgyu ma dang sprul pa'i dpes phyin ci log bzhi med
translated: The setting forth in the abandonment of error is the deed of establishing in the abandonment of the four errors that follows that.

original: pa spong ba'i ye shes la rab tu dgod pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: pa spong ba'i ye shes la rab tu dgod pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The setting forth in the wisdom of the abandonment of the four errors is the deed of establishing in the wisdom of the abandonment of the four errors that follows that, by means of the refutation of entities by the mere parts of the body, by means of the examples of dream, reflection, echo, mirage, illusion, and emanation.

original: rnam par byang ba la rab tu 'jog pa ni gang de'i rjes su tha snyad la brten te /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba la rab tu 'jog pa ni gang de'i rjes su tha snyad la brten te /
translated: The function of establishing in purification is that, after that,

original: rnam par byang ba la rab tu 'god pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //🔽de'i tshogs la nye bar 'god pa ni gang de'i rjes la tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa la rab tu 'jog pa nas brtsams te /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba la rab tu 'god pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no // de'i tshogs la nye bar 'god pa ni gang de'i rjes la tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa la rab tu 'jog pa nas brtsams te /
translated: he performs the function of establishing in purification by means of conventional knowledge.🔽The function of establishing in its collection is that, after that,

original: mtha' gnyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: mtha' gnyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: he performs the function of establishing in the realization of the equality of the two extremes, beginning from the establishment in the completion of the collection.🔽The function of establishing in the knowledge of the non-differentiation of the compounded and the uncompounded is that, after that,

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas tha mi dad par yongs su shes pa la 'god pa ni gang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dag gcig la gcig tha dad pa nye bar dmigs par sngon du song ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas tha mi dad par yongs su shes pa la 'god pa ni gang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dag gcig la gcig tha dad pa nye bar dmigs par sngon du song ba'i phyir te /
translated: he performs the function of establishing in the knowledge of the non-differentiation of the compounded and the uncompounded, because he previously observed the compounded and uncompounded phenomena as different from each other.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de gnyis su rtogs pa'i dus su mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid dang / don dam pa rtogs pa nas 'dus byas dag rnam grangs gzhan med pas zhes gsungs pa dang / chos rnams stong pa nyid yin pas gang la yang ce yid byed pa @178b yang med pas sems can rnams su 'du shes pa thams cad dang bral bar byed pa dang /
analyzed: de gnyis su rtogs pa'i dus su mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid dang / don dam pa rtogs pa nas 'dus byas dag rnam grangs gzhan med pas zhes gsungs pa dang / chos rnams stong pa nyid yin pas gang la yang ce yid byed pa @178b yang med pas sems can rnams su 'du shes pa thams cad dang bral bar byed pa dang /
translated: And because phenomena are emptiness, there is no mental engagement whatsoever, so one is free from all the perceptions of sentient beings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu byed pa yin par bstan pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu byed pa yin par bstan pas so zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: And because it is taught that the thus-gone ones are the agents of the creation of the world, this is what is being taught.

original: nyi shu bdun pa mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod pa'i phrin las ni gang chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu yin pa nyid kyis skye ba dang 'gag pa las rnam par grol ba dang / ma 'dus pa'i chos mya ngan las 'das par sprul pa nyid yin pa dang /
analyzed: nyi shu bdun pa mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod pa'i phrin las ni gang chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu yin pa nyid kyis skye ba dang 'gag pa las rnam par grol ba dang / ma 'dus pa'i chos mya ngan las 'das par sprul pa nyid yin pa dang /
translated: The twenty-seventh, the activity of establishing in nirvāṇa, is as follows. Since all phenomena are like magical creations, they are free from arising and ceasing.

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni mya ngan las 'das pa nyid yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzhung ji ltar rdzogs par rnyed pa'i tshig gis ni sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
